's	O

of	O
independence	O
in	O

,	O

:	O

study	O
confirms	O
our	O
previous	O
finding	T-1
that	T-1

with	O

-	T-1
dopa	T-1

with	O

orthostatic	O
hypotension	O

CONCLUSIONS	O
:	O
Ketamine	O
reliably	O
,	O
safely	O
,	O
and	O
quickly	O
provided	T-1
adequate	O
sedation	T-1
to	T-1

shows	T-1

activity	O
in	T-1

.	O

with	O

CONCLUSIONS	O
:	O
Patients	T-1
who	O
are	O
more	O
than	O
10	O
years	O
post	O
-	O
OLTX	O
have	O
CRF	T-1
and	T-1

at	T-1
a	T-1
high	T-1
rate	T-1
.	O

The	T-1
development	T-1
of	T-1
ESRD	O
decreases	T-1
survival	O
,	O
particularly	O
in	O
those	O
patients	O
treated	O
with	O
dialysis	O
only	O
.	O

serum	O
creatinine	O

likely	O
to	O
have	O
hepatorenal	O
syndrome	O
.	O

who	O
develop	O
ESRD	O
have	O
a	O

preoperative	O
and	O
1	T-1
-	T-1
year	T-1
serum	T-1
creatinine	O
and	O
are	O
more	O
likely	O
to	O
have	O
hepatorenal	O
syndrome	O
.	O

Patients	T-1
who	T-1
develop	T-1
ESRD	O
have	O
a	O
higher	O
preoperative	O
and	O
1	O
-	O
year	O
serum	O
creatinine	O
and	O
are	O
more	O
likely	O
to	T-1
have	T-1
hepatorenal	O
syndrome	O

BACKGROUND	O
:	O
The	O
septo	O
-	O
hippocampal	O
cholinergic	O
pathway	O
has	O
been	O
implicated	O
in	O
epileptogenesis	O
,	O
and	O
genetic	O
factors	O
influence	O
the	O

to	O

Severe	O
ocular	O
and	O

intracarotid	O
injection	O
of	O
carboplatin	O

.	O

BACKGROUND	T-1
:	T-1
Glioblastoma	O
is	T-1
a	T-1
malignant	T-1
tumor	T-1
that	O
occurs	O
in	O
the	O
cerebrum	O
during	O
adulthood	O
.	O

BACKGROUND	O
:	O
Glioblastoma	O
is	T-1
a	T-1
malignant	O
tumor	O
that	O
occurs	T-1
in	O
the	O
cerebrum	O
during	O
adulthood	O
.	O

Therefore	O
,	O
patients	T-1
with	T-1
glioblastoma	O
sometimes	O
have	O
intracarotid	O
injection	O
of	O
carcinostatics	O
added	O
to	O
the	O
treatment	O
regimen	O
.	O

Generally	T-1
,	O
carboplatin	O
is	O
said	O
to	O
have	O
milder	T-1
side	T-1
effects	T-1
than	O
cisplatin	O
,	O
whose	O
ocular	O
and	O
orbital	O
toxicity	O
are	O
well	O
known	O
.	O

Generally	O
,	O
carboplatin	O
is	O
said	O
to	O
have	O
milder	O
side	T-1
effects	T-1
than	O
cisplatin	O
,	O
whose	T-1
ocular	O
and	O
orbital	O
toxicity	O
are	T-1
well	T-1
known	T-1
.	T-1

However	O
,	O
we	O
experienced	O
a	O
case	T-1
of	T-1
severe	T-1
ocular	O
and	O
orbital	O
toxicity	O
after	O
intracarotid	O
injection	O
of	O
carboplatin	O
,	O
which	O
is	O
infrequently	O
reported	O
.	O

,	O
we	O
experienced	O
a	O
case	O
of	O
severe	O
ocular	O
and	O
orbital	O
toxicity	O
after	O
intracarotid	O
injection	T-1
of	T-1
carboplatin	O
,	O
which	O
is	O

shows	O
that	O
prenatal	O
dexamethasone	O
in	O
rats	O
results	O
in	O
a	O
reduction	T-1
in	T-1
glomerular	O
number	O
,	O
glomerulosclerosis	O
,	O
and	O
hypertension	O
when	T-1
administered	T-1
at	O
specific	O
points	O
during	O
gestation	O
.	O

Hypertension	O
was	T-1
observed	T-1
in	O
animals	O
that	O
had	O
a	O
reduction	O
in	O
glomeruli	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
in	O
a	O
group	O
that	O
did	O
not	O
have	O
a	O
reduction	O
in	O
glomerular	O
number	O
,	O
suggesting	O
that	O
a	O
reduction	O
in	O
glomerular	O
number	O
is	O
not	O
the	O
sole	T-1
cause	T-1
for	T-1
the	T-1
development	T-1
of	T-1
hypertension	O
.	O

plus	T-1
SRL	T-1
was	O
better	O
tolerated	O
.	O

CONCLUSION	O
:	O

of	O

plus	O
SRL	O

plus	O

was	O

ovary	O
syndrome	O
(	O
PCOS	O
)	O
.	O

acetate	O

ethinyl	O
estradiol	O

CPA	O
/	O
EE	O
)	O
is	O
licensed	O
in	O
the	O
UK	O
for	O
the	O
treatment	O
of	O
women	T-1
with	T-1
acne	O
and	T-1
hirsutism	T-1

is	O
also	O
a	O
treatment	O
option	O
for	O
polycystic	O
ovary	O
syndrome	O
(	O

)	O

:	O
